You Determine the Price!
RM 5,000,000
*Note: You can stop the price by pressing the STOP button. The price is randomly generated, once you stop the price, it is considered the final price that you have to pay to buy this property, company, or train station. If you didn't stop the price within 10 seconds, the system will stop it automatically after 10 seconds. The price range falls between RM 300,000 to RM 5,000,000. Good luck.
